title: Port some of the SolrMetricReporter enhancements from master to 6.x
description: This is a spin-off from SOLR-9959, which added significant improvements to the way reporters manage service clients as well as improved the support for metric filtering. There was also a bug in SolrJmxReporter's handling of serviceUrl.
